item.title: Beogram 4002 (5521): A Stuck Tonearm and Polishing the Hood
item.description:
A Beogram 4002 turntable, which I had previously repaired, returned with a tonearm tracking issue. The problem was a misaligned tracking sensor aperture obstructing the arm’s movement. To fix this, I slightly repositioned the aperture after loosening its screw. I replaced the original screw with a more secure flat socket head screw to prevent future misalignment. I then recalibrated the tracking sensor feedback. While the Beogram was with me, the customer decided to have the dust cover polished...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4002-5521-a-stuck-tonearm-and-polishing-the-hood/
